thread.title: New bill set to clear historical consensual gay sex crimes in ACT
thread.title_full: New bill set to clear historical consensual gay sex crimes in ACT

title: New bill set to clear historical consensual gay sex crimes in ACT
text:
New bill set to clear historical cons... New bill set to clear historical consensual gay sex crimes in ACT 1 hr ago Read more: Sydney Star Observer 
The ACT's upcoming bill to clear historic convictions of consensual homosexual activities prior to its decriminalisation has been welcomed, but questions have been raised on whether it will properly "expunge" them. A NEW bill allowing people to clear their name if they were convicted of consensual homosexual activities prior to its decriminalisation is on track to being passed by the ACT Legislative Assembly. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Star Observer.
